panels.description: Shows if metrics are being received for the selected time range.
panels.title: Metrics

panels.description: Shows the timestamp of the latest metrics received for this integration in the last 24 hours.
panels.title: Latest metrics received

panels.description: Shows the installed version of this integration.
panels.title: Integration version

panels.description: Number of proxies in the Istio system.
panels.title: Proxies

panels.description: Number of gateways in the Istio system.

targets.expr: max(pilot_k8s_cfg_events{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster", type="Gateway", event="add"}) - (max(pilot_k8s_cfg_events{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster", type="Gateway", event="delete"}) or max(up * 0))

panels.title: Gateways

panels.description: Number of virtual services in the Istio system.
panels.title: Virtual services

panels.description: Number of destination rules in the Istio system.
panels.title: Destination rules

panels.description: Number of service entries in the Istio system.
panels.title: Service entries

panels.description: Number of workload entries in the Istio system.
panels.title: Workload entries

panels.description: vCPU usage for various components of the Istio system.
panels.title: vCPU usage

panels.description: Number of open file descriptors for various components of the Istio system.
panels.title: Open file descriptors

panels.description: Available virtual memory compared to the resident memory for the various components of the Istio system.
panels.title: Virtual & resident memory

panels.description: Heap memory information for the various components of the Istio system.
panels.title: Heap memory

panels.description: HTTP/GRPC request rate for the components of the Istio system.
panels.title: HTTP/GRPC requests

panels.description: Recent number of successful (1xx, 2xx, 3xx) vs error (4xx, 5xx) HTTP responses received by various components of the Istio system.

targets.expr: increase(sum by(job, cluster) (istio_requests_total{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",pod=~"$gateway", reporter="source", request_protocol="http", response_code=~"[123].+"})[$__interval:])
increase(sum by(job, cluster) (istio_requests_total{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",pod=~"$gateway", reporter="source", request_protocol="http", response_code=~"[45].+"})[$__interval:])
increase(sum by(job, cluster) (istio_requests_total{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",pod=~"$proxy", reporter="source", request_protocol="http", response_code=~"[123].+"})[$__interval:])
increase(sum by(job, cluster) (istio_requests_total{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster",pod=~"$proxy", reporter="source", request_protocol="http", response_code=~"[45].+"})[$__interval:])

panels.title: HTTP response overview

panels.description: Number of xDS pushes by Istiod over the entire time range for the Istio system.
panels.title: xDS pushes

panels.description: The latency of xDS pushes by Istiod over the entire time range for the Istio system.
panels.title: xDS push delay (s)

panels.description: Number of galley validations over the entire time range for the Istio system.
panels.title: Galley validations

panels.description: The send and receive data rates from all envoy proxies in the Istio system.
panels.title: xDS envoy throughput

panels.description: The xDS related errors across the Istio system.
panels.title: xDS errors / $__interval

panels.description: Number of sidecar injections over the entire time range for the Istio system.
panels.title: Sidecar injections

panels.description: Service details for the Istio system.

targets.expr:
sum by(job, cluster, service) (label_replace(increase(istio_request_duration_milliseconds_sum{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster", reporter="source"}[$__rate_interval:]), "service", "$1", "source_canonical_service", "(.*)"))
/
clamp_min(sum by(job, cluster, service) (label_replace(increase(istio_request_duration_milliseconds_count{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster", reporter="source"}[$__rate_interval:]), "service", "$1", "source_canonical_service", "(.*)")), 1)

sum by(job, cluster, service) (label_replace(increase(istio_request_duration_milliseconds_sum{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster", reporter="destination"}[$__rate_interval:]), "service", "$1", "destination_canonical_service", "(.*)"))
/
clamp_min(sum by(job, cluster, service) (label_replace(increase(istio_request_duration_milliseconds_count{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster", reporter="destination"}[$__rate_interval:]), "service", "$1", "destination_canonical_service", "(.*)")), 1)

100 * sum by(job, cluster, service) (label_replace(increase(istio_requests_total{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster", reporter="source", request_protocol="http", response_code=~"[123].+"}[$__rate_interval:]), "service", "$1", "source_canonical_service", "(.*)"))
/
clamp_min(sum by(job, cluster, service) (label_replace(increase(istio_requests_total{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster", reporter="source", request_protocol="http"}[$__rate_interval:]), "service", "$1", "source_canonical_service", "(.*)")), 1)

100 * sum by(job, cluster, service) (label_replace(increase(istio_requests_total{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster", reporter="destination", request_protocol="http", response_code=~"[123].+"}[$__rate_interval:]), "service", "$1", "destination_canonical_service", "(.*)"))
/
clamp_min(sum by(job, cluster, service) (label_replace(increase(istio_requests_total{job=~"$job",cluster=~"$cluster", reporter="destination", request_protocol="http"}[$__rate_interval:]), "service", "$1", "destination_canonical_service", "(.*)")), 1)

panels.title: Services
